      • getActiveOffers

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject getActiveOffers(java.lang.String beaconId,
                                         java.lang.String type)
        This method used to get active offers from database based on the beacon id and offer type.
        Specified by:
        getActiveOffers in interface OffersService
        Parameters:
        beaconId - an unique string mapped with studio.
        type - welcome or exit type offer.
        Returns:
        return all active offers mapped with studio.

      • saveOffers

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject saveOffers(int ofrId,
                                    int ofrStdId,
                                    java.lang.String ofrType,
                                    java.lang.String ofrStatus,
                                    java.lang.String ofrImg,
                                    java.lang.String ofrDescription,
                                    java.lang.String ofrExternalLink,
                                    java.util.Date ofrCreatedDate)
        This method is used to save welcome/ exit notification offers into database. It will return a offer id of just inserted or updated.
        Specified by:
        saveOffers in interface OffersService
        Parameters:
        ofrId - the primary key of offers.
        ofrStdId - the primary key of studio.
        ofrType - welcome or exit type offer.
        ofrStatus - active or inactive status.
        ofrImg - offer image.
        ofrDescription - description about the offer.
        ofrExternalLink - external link.
        ofrCreatedDate - offer created date.
        Returns:
        return offer id.

      • offerSearch

        public org.json.simple.JSONArray offerSearch(java.lang.String ofrname)
        This method used to get all the offers from database and helps to search the offers based on offer name passed string.
        Specified by:
        offerSearch in interface OffersService
        Parameters:
        ofrname - name of the offer that has to be searched.
        Returns:
        returns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.
